items.title: Frequently Asked Questions

items.response: You can reach us via email at *enablement@liferay.com*. We’re here to help!
items.description: Provides contact details for the company.
items.title: Contact Information

items.response:
Rely on experts to manage, host, and scale your Liferay application and infrastructure so that you can focus on growing your business.

✅ Fully managed services including infrastructure and application management, hosting and security

✅ 99.8% SLA of Liferay DXP application

✅ Automatic Liferay DXP updates and fixes
items.title: SaaS Introduction

items.response:
Simplify the deployment and management of your project by letting Liferay handle the cloud infrastructure, so you can focus on maintaining your application.

✅ *99.95% Infrastructure SLA*

✅ *Built-in CI/CD capabilities*

✅ *Environment management*

✅ *Advanced monitoring features*
items.title: PaaS Introduction

items.response:
Liferay provides a range of services primarily focused on digital experience and enterprise solutions. Here are some key offerings:

Digital Experience Platform (DXP): Liferay’s core product that helps organizations create, manage, and optimize digital experiences across various channels.

Portal Solutions: Tools for building intranets, extranets, and public-facing websites that can integrate with existing systems and provide a cohesive user experience.

Collaboration Tools: Features like document management, forums, wikis, and social networking to facilitate communication and collaboration within organizations.

Content Management: A robust content management system (CMS) for creating, managing, and delivering content seamlessly across different platforms.

Integration Capabilities: APIs and connectors for integrating with third-party applications and services, ensuring a connected ecosystem.

Customization and Development Tools: Frameworks and SDKs that allow developers to customize applications and extend functionalities according to business needs.

Cloud Solutions: Options for deploying Liferay on-premises or in the cloud, providing flexibility for organizations.

Analytics and Personalization: Tools to analyze user behavior and personalize experiences based on insights gained from data.

Support and Training: Professional services including consulting, training, and support to help organizations maximize their use of Liferay products.

These services are designed to enhance user engagement, streamline operations, and drive digital transformation for businesses.
items.description: Lists the services provided by the company.
items.title: Our Services

items.response:
Deploy Liferay DXP in either on-premise or self-hosted cloud models, giving you complete control over your application and infrastructure so that you can meet your specific IT requirements.

✅ *Access to all Liferay capabilities*

✅ *Compatible with Azure, AWS, or Google Cloud Platform (GCP)*

✅ *Enterprise subscription that includes support, maintenance, and legal assurance*
items.title: Self-Hosted Introduction

items.response:
Welcome to Liferay's bot!

Here, you can learn more about our services and how we can help you.

Type /help to see the available commands.
items.description: Initiates the interaction with the bot.
items.title: Welcome

items.response:
Here are the commands you can use:

/contact - Get our contact information

/faq - Frequently Asked Questions

/services - See what Liferay offers
